privacy.analytics_sub_1: Your data is safe. All information we gather is and will stay anonymous. It will be used by our team to understand how can we improve Carbonio.
privacy.full_error_sub_1: We all make mistakes but it's how you deal with them that changes everything! We want to learn from our errors so let us know how we can fix them
privacy.survey_feedback_sub_1: Don't worry, surveys will be quick, easy and super useful to us to understand how we're going.
